column4: i have 8.04 on CD and would like to use that to upgrade rather than downloading. However, can't seem to add the CD to Software Sources?

To Upgrade from the CD/ISO, you'll need the alternate ISO or the DVD: run cdromupgrade from the root of the CD/ISO/DVD. If you don't want to/can't burn a disc, you can 'mount -o loop nameofiso /path/to/mount/'
ah. i only have the normal CD i think - so that is a no-go?
